mapper.select: SELECT DE_CODE, DE_ID, DE_LCODE, LB_NAME, de_Quantity, BK_NAME, BK_INTRODUCTION,BK_PUBLISHER,BK_PUBLICDAY, BK_WRITER, BK_IMAGE, BK_BG_NUM,BG_CATE,BK_SG_NUM,SG_CATE FROM delivery JOIN BOOKS ON DE_CODE = BK_CODE JOIN LIBRARY ON DE_LCODE = LB_CODE JOIN BIGGROUP ON BK_BG_NUM = BG_NUM JOIN SMALLGROUP ON BK_SG_NUM = SG_BG_NUM
